price: When that Day comes, no one will speak except by His permission. Some among them will be wretched and others blissful.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يَأۡتِ لَا تَكَلَّمُ نَفۡسٌ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِهِۦۚ فَمِنۡهُمۡ شَقِيّٞ وَسَعِيدٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
